name: assignment2
description: Assignment No.2 Q 1:  Write a program that calculates the area of a rectangle. Q 2: Write a program that takes input and calculates the volume of a cube. Q 3:  Write a program that checks if a given number is positive, negative, or zero. Q 4:   Write a program that checks if a given number is even or odd. Q 5:  Write a program that determines if a person is eligible to vote based on their age. Q 6:  Write a program that calculates the result of a mathematical expression.	((10 + 5) * 3 - 2) / (4 % 3)  - 7)
